author: Special Correspondent
text: A group of ‘Salai Paniyalargal’ (road workers) staged a protest at the office of the Divisional Engineer, Highways, near Toll Gate here on Thursday to protest over cut in their salary for the period of their participation in the recent strike. A section of them took part in the strike called by the Tamil Nadu Government Employees’ Association. Irked over the salary cut, a group of workers staged an agitation. Their attempt to prepare food in front of the office was foiled by the police who landed at the spot and held talks with the workers. The workers wanted money to be paid in cash and not in cheque.
title: Salai Paniyalargal protest pay cut
